title: Ādaži municipality head steps down
summary_full: Karīna Miķelsone (Latvian Regional Alliance), chair of the Ādaži municipal council, resigned from her position on Thursday, January 8th, the municipality said.
summary_public: Karīna Miķelsone (Latvian Regional Alliance), chair of the Ādaži municipal council, resigned from her position on Thursday, January 8th, the municipality said.
